echo_shard.Description: Reset the cooldown of the imbued non-ultimate ability.

refresher.Description: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.

ablative_coat.Description: Provides Bullet Resist but you lose some each time you take Weapon Damage. Loss can only happen once every {s:StackLossFrequency}s. Bullet Resist is restored when out of combat.

witchmail.Description: Taking heavy hits of {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} from an enemy reduces a random ability cooldown.

spirit_strike.Description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.

shield_rush.Description: Give temporary bullet shield for you and nearby allied Heros and their minions.

active_reload.Description: While reloading, pressing R during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.

ammo_scavenger.Description:
Any time you secure or deny a Soul from an entity you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.
At Max Stacks, gain bonus Sprint speed

emp_grenade.Description: Throw a grenade that silences enemies and lowers their spirit resistance.

smoke.Description:
Give you and teammates invisibility and a move speed bonus. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility.
Cast delay: {s:AbilityCastDelay}s.

spirit_barrier_pulse.Description: Temporarily gain spirit barrier for you and all nearby allied units.

armor_piercing_rounds.Description: Your bullets reduce the target's bullet resistance by {s:ResistReduction}% of their current value for {s:AbilityDuration}s and deal bonus damage against bullet shields.

arcane_eater.Description: Your bullets Steal Spirit Power from enemy Heroes. Steal {s:HeadshotBonusSteal} extra Spirit Power with Headshots. This effect stacks.

duration_extender.Description: Imbue an ability to increase its Duration.

arcane_medallion.Description: Whenever you deal {s:MinimumDamage} Spirit damage or more in a single hit against an enemy hero, gain temporary Spirit Power.

arcane_surge.Description: When you Dash-Jump the next ability you use will have bonus Range, Duration, and Spirit Power. Lasts up to 7s.

arctic_blast.Description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage, Freezing and then Slowing targets it hits. Targets take increased damage while frozen.

belt-fed_magazine.Description: Your weapon gains a much larger magazine that requires spin-up time, starting with a slower initial fire rate and becoming faster over the spin-up time.

berserker.Description: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

blood_tribute.Description: Toggle: Continually sacrifice Health to improve {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'FireRate'}, Debuff Resistance and Move Speed. Healing received is reduced during the sacrifice.

lifestrike.Description: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for 60% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 160. This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.

hunters_aura.Description: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.

weapon_jammer.Description: Reduces the Fire Rate of all nearby enemies.

bullet_resist_shredder.Description: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.

burst_fire.Description: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.

burst_fire_actuator.Description: Your weapon fires an additional percentage of your gun's starting clip as a burst. If all bullets in a burst connect with an enemy Hero, gain temporary Base Bullet Damage for the rest of the clip.

camouflage_suit.Description: Go invisible and maintain invisibility by not moving or attacking. Taking damage will not reveal the Hero. Bonus Regen while Invisible.

capacitor.Description: Launch a projectile that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritIcon'}damage, removes all their non-ultimate buffs and applies a strong slow that recovers over time.

enduring_speed.Description: Reduces the effect of enemy Move Speed penalties.

tesla_bullets.Description: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.

charmed_wraps.Description: Your abilities get their cooldowns reduced when you perform a heavy melee attack against a hero (or two light melee attacks within {s:LightMeleeTimeWindow}s).

fortitude.Description: After not taking damage for 12s, gain 3.0% Max Health Regen.

cloaking_device.Description: Become invisible. Nearby enemies will temporaily reveal the hero. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility for {s:AbilityCooldown}s.

shadow_weave.Description: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.

point_blank.Description: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.

close_quarters.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.

cold_front.Description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.

colossus.Description: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the move and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.

combo_breaker.Description:
Remove all debuffs and heal yourself.
Can be used while stunned.

slowing_hex.Description:
Slows movement of enemy target. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.

superior_cooldown.Description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

soul_explosion.Description: Kills or assists cause an explosion where the victim dies. Kills against heroes have greater radius and damage.

counterspell.Description: Your next parry protects you from the damage and effects of enemy abilities and items. On a successful spell parry gain Move Speed and Spirit Power.

mystic_shot.Description: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.

lucky_shot.Description:
Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus weapon damage on hit.
Bonus damage cannot Crit.

crushing_fists.Description:
Your {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'MeleeDamage'} will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.

If the target reaches max stacks, they will be stunned.

leech.Description: Reduces the effect of enemy applied healing reduction.

debuff_reducer.Description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

plated_armor.Description: Gain a chance to either deflect incoming bullets, preventing all {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} or prevent all on-hit effects from bullets.

drain_will.Description: Fires a projectile which reduces the Fire Rate of the target and steals Spirit.

scourge.Description:
Apply Spirit Resistance and an aura on a friendly target that deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritIcon'}damage to enemies proportional to their max health.
Can be self cast.

divine_barrier.Description:
Remove all non-stun debuffs from the target and provide them with a Barrier and Move Speed.
Can be self-cast. Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

diviners_kevlar.Description: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain a Barrier and temporary Spirit Power.

double-jump.Description: Allows you to perform an additional jump in mid-air.

heroic_aura.Description: Provides Bullet Resist to nearby friendly units.

drum_magazine.Description: Provides a large ammo bonus, and increased reload speed

[deprecated]_duration_extender.Description: Increases Duration of your abilities and items by {s:NonImbuedBonusDuration}%.

spellslinger.Description:
Whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves fire rate and reload speed.
Each stack refreshes the duration.

escalating_exposure.Description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

mercurial_magnum.Description: Your imbued ability charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}, and bonus bullets on use. Until your next reload, your bullets deal bonus Spirit Damage based on your Spirit Power.

express_shot.Description: After not attacking for 4s, your next attack will fire twice in quick succession with increased damage and velocity. This attack consumes extra ammo.

extra_charge.Description: Adds one to your ability max charges.

frenzy.Description: While you are below 50% health, you gain stat bonuses.

fire_rate_aura.Description: Provides a Fire Rate increase to you and nearby teammates. Different bonus to non-Heroes

focus_lens.Description: Target an enemy to silence them. A portion of all damage dealt during the silence gets applied to the target when the silence wears off.

glass_cannon.Description: Each hero kill grants permanent Fire Rate (up to a max of 8 times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

glass_cannon_v2.Description: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

curse.Description: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.

disarming_hex.Description: Disarms enemy target and reduces their Bullet Resist.

guardian_ward.Description:
Provide the target with a Barrier and temporary Move Speed.
Can be self-cast.
Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

headhunter.Description: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.

headshot_booster.Description: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots.

weakening_headshot.Description: Upon landing a headshot reduce target's Bullet Resist.

patrons_healing.Description: When you receive a Boon, automatically heal.

healbane.Description: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

healing_tempo.Description:
Applying {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Heal'} to yourself or an ally grants the target {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.

Does not apply on innate Regen or innate Bullet/Spirit Lifesteal.

healing_booster.Description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by 25%.

healing_nova.Description: Heal yourself and nearby allies.

healing_aura.Description:
Automatically provides a burst of healing to yourself and nearby friendlies every {s:HealInterval} seconds.
Effect does not stack.

spirit_lifesteal.Description: Your spirit items and abilities heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal. Heals for less on Non-Heroes and does not work on buildings.

healing_rite.Description: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

height_advantage.Description: Gain additional {s:HighGroundBonusWeaponPower}% Weapon Damage when attacking targets that are below you.

high_impact_armor.Description: Provides protection against high-damage bullets. Any bullet damage portion above the threshold is reduced by {s:DamageReduction}%.

hollow_point.Description: When you are above 65% health, deal additional Weapon Damage and your bullets reduce enemy Bullet Resist.

superior_duration.Description: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.

bullet_resilience.Description: When below 30% health, gain additional Bullet Resist.

infuser.Description: Gain Spirit Lifesteal and Spirit Power.

inhibitor.Description: Your bullets reduce the target's outgoing damage and apply healing reduction.

intensifying_magazine.Description: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

juggernaut.Description: Enemies that shoot you have their Fire Rate slowed.

kinetic_dash.Description: When you Dash-Jump you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to 7s.

melee_lifesteal.Description: Your next Melee attack heals you. You heal for 30% of the value against non-heroes.

long_range.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

omni_spirit.Description: Applies a movement slow to enemies when dealing spirit damage.

mystic_burst.Description: Charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, causing abilities dealing more than 80 damage to deal additional damage.

magic_carpet.Description:
Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away. While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.
Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.

clarity.Description: On ability or item use, gain a move speed bonus for {s:AbilityDuration}s. Your next ability cast will remove the move speed bonus and apply a Spirit bonus to that ability.

mystic_expansion.Description: Imbue an ability to increase its range and effect radius.

enchanters_emblem.Description: While you are above 65% health, gain bonus {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Spirit'} and Cooldown Reduction.

tankbuster.Description: Charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, causing abilities dealing more than 165 damage to deal additional damage.

mystic_slow.Description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Move Speed reduced.

surge_of_power.Description: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Move Speed and maintain full speed while attacking.

compress_cooldown.Description: Imbue an ability to reduce its Cooldown.

mystic_vulnerability.Description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.

restorative_shot.Description: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.

melee_charge.Description: Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage.

rebuttal.Description: On a successful Parry against an enemy Hero, Heal yourself for the damage parried and returns that damage to the target, and temporarily gain increased melee damage.

soul_disruptor.Description: Throw a grenade that explodes on contact and applies silence and increasing amounts of damage to each enemy.

mystic_regeneration.Description: Dealing Spirit Damage to enemy Heroes grants you Bonus Health Regen. Stacks when dealing damage to different heroes.

adrenaline_rush.Description: Gain bonus Weapon Damage and Fire Rate when there are two or more enemy heroes nearby.

monster_rounds.Description: Gain additional 25% Weapon Damage when attacking Troopers, Neutrals and Bosses.

cultist_sacrifice.Description: Target an enemy NPC and consume it for 150% Bonus Souls and grants a powerful long lasting buff.

rebirth.Description: Respawns the hero at the spot they died.

phantom_strike.Description: Teleport to an enemy target and pull them to the ground. Dealing damage, Move speed reduction and Disarm.

predator_precision.Description: Gain additional weapon damage against enemy Heroes that are low health

opening_rounds.Description: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above 50% health.

disarming_bullets.Description: Your bullets disarm enemies, them preventing them from shooting their weapon. Victims are immune to disarming bullets for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after application expires.

silencer.Description: Your bullets build up to a Silence. Victims are immune to the build up for 10s after silence expires. Your bullets reduce the target's outgoing sprit damage.

magitech_rounds.Description: Your bullets also deal your base bullet damage [{s:BaseDamagePerShot}] as spirit damage. Magitech Rounds receives {s:SpellAmplificationMultiplier}x amplification from Spirit Power. Shotguns split the damage between each pellet. This effect can only happen once every {s:ProcCooldown}s.

quarantine.Description: Quarantine an enemy Hero, making them invincible but also silencing and disarming them.

quicksilver_reload.Description: Your imbued ability charges up over time with {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'}, {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}, and bonus bullets on use.

debuff_remover.Description: Purge all non-ultimate negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, heal yourself and gain a move speed bonus. Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.

battle_vest.Description: While you are above 65% health, gain {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} and {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusFireRate'}.

regenerative_armor.Description: Gain a short burst of health regeneration when taking bullet damage from heroes

escalating_resilience.Description: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.

rescue_beam.Description: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.

restorative_locket.Description: Consume all stacks to heal target ally and replenish 2 stamina points. Can be self-cast.

return_fire.Description: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

ricochet.Description: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.

majestic_leap.Description:
Launch yourself high into the air and grant yourself a Barrier. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.

Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by enemy Hero.

majestic_leap_-_disabled.Description: Launch yourself high into the air. Cannot be used for {s:InteruptCooldown}s if damaged by enemy Hero.

decay.Description: Inflict damage over time to a target, dealing damage based on their current health.

ethereal_shift.Description:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform actions. Afterwards you gain Spirit Power, Move Speed, and Spirit Resist.
Can be canceled early.
Activation cancels any active ability.

sharpshooter.Description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

unstoppable_-_deprecated.Description: Purges any roots and chains on use and makes you immune to slows for the duration

slowing_bullets.Description: Your bullets build up a Movement Slow on enemies.

slowing_spirit.Description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies Movement Slows to your target.

spellbreaker.Description: The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.

hexafoil_ward.Description: Block the next Spirit Damage or Debuff, preventing its effects. Only regenerates outside of combat.

spirit_shielding.Description: Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDamage'} from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.

spirit_burn.Description:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within 5s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half-damage to non-heroes and does not expend its cooldown unless a hero is hit.

spirit_sap.Description: Target an enemy to reduce their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.

spirit_snatch.Description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, the attack deals extra Spirit Damage and steals Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.

split_shot.Description:
Make your weapon fire multishot.

Hitting more than one Hero per attack will grant a stacking weapon damage bonus.

Targets can only be hit once per multishot.

sprint_boots.Description: Increases your forward move speed over time. Taking damage resets the effect for 1.5s

stabilizer.Description: Removes the move speed penalty while shooting, and increases bullet speed.

stabilizing_tripod.Description: Disarm yourself to toss your weapon to the target location where it transforms into a Field Sentry that will attack enemies using your weapon with an unlimited clip. You can melee the sentry to end the effect early.

hex-sealed_knuckles.Description: After dealing an accumulated {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage, your next Heavy Melee Attack deals an additional {s:StoredSpiritDamage} spirit damage.

stamina_mastery.Description: Allows an additional use of Air Jump or Air Dash before landing.

suppressor.Description: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also reduce their Fire Rate.

knockdown.Description: Apply a Stun after 2s. Stun duration is increased against airborne targets.

silence_wave.Description:
Launch an expanding projectile which Silences enemies for a short duration. Affected enemies also have their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power reduced for a longer duration.

Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

spirit_armor.Description: Reduces the damage you take from Spirit abilities.

mystic_reverb.Description: Imbue an ability to apply slow on a hit target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

quantum_chimaera.Description: Your Tech attacks strike additional nearby enemies for 75% of the total damage.

torment_pulse.Description: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

spirit_shredder_bullets.Description: Your bullets apply a debuff that reduces the Spirit Resist of the target and grants you and your allies Spirit Lifesteal against them.

spiritual_overflow.Description: Gain bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power by charging up when shooting enemy heroes.

spirit_resilience.Description: When below 30% health, gain additional Spirit Resist.

greater_expansion.Description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

alchemical_fire.Description:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and reduces enemy Bullet Resist.

50% less effective vs non-heroes.

toxic_bullets.Description: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their Max Health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.

trophy_collector.Description: Whenever you score an assist or kill, gain extra health, sprint, ability range and passive soul generation. This effect stacks and persists through death.

lightning_scroll.Description: Damage from your ultimate applies a {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'Stun'} and deals {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusSpiritDamage'} after a short delay.

unstoppable.Description:
Temporarily suppress negative status effects and become immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.

bullet_lifesteal.Description: Your bullets heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal to enemies. Half as effective vs Non-Heroes.

veil_walker.Description: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, Heal and increased Move Speed.

reactive_barrier.Description: Automatically restores one stamina and gain a Barrier when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.

warp_stone.Description: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.

backstabber.Description: Attacking enemies from behind with your weapon or melee opens a wound dealing {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'SpiritDPS'} and reducing their bullet resist. During this time, if you or any allies are near the target, will see them through walls and be given {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'BonusMoveSpeed'}.

detention_rounds.Description: Your bullets build up on enemies, causing them to be tethered to their position.

weapon_eater.Description:
Reduces Courage by {s:BaseBonusCounter}.
Gain {s:WeaponPowerPerKill} Courage (Up to {s:MaxWeaponPower}) for killing an enemy Hero but lose {s:WeaponPowerPerDeath} gained Courage on Death. Bonus applied if damage was done within {s:KillWindow}s of enemy killed.

reloader_+_huge_clip.Description: Press the [Reload] key while reloading to instantly finish your reload

overdrive_clip.Description: Deal non-lethal damage based on your max health to yourself and reload bullets in your clip equal to your max ammo, no matter how many bullets are left. The bullets in this clip have additional courage.

overdrive.Description: Increase your Courage while draining your own health.

weapon_shielding.Description: Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant {g:citadel_inline_attribute:'WeaponDamage'} from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.

rusted_barrel.Description: Target an enemy to reduce their Fire Rate.
